comment._content:
Thank you, John, your work is noticed but you do not get the 
credit you should I am sure... a neat candid capture of this
moment all in a day's work!!!
comment.authorname: maorlando God kept us 2012 leaning on Him 2013

comment.author: 47290943@N03
comment._content: [http://www.flickr.com/photos/55597723@N02] One of those jobs, John, that when it's done well (as I'm sure you did it) it goes unnoticed, but when it's done badly or not at all - people certainly notice...
